snippet: Carlos Saúl Menem was sentenced to four and half years in prison for overseeing a $466 million embezzlement scheme during his presidency in the 1990s.
abstract: Former Argentine Pres Carlos Saul Menem is convicted of embezzlement and sentenced to more than four years in prison.
lead_paragraph: Carlos Saúl Menem was sentenced to four and half years in prison for overseeing a $466 million embezzlement scheme during his presidency in the 1990s.

headline.main: Ex-President of Argentina Is Sentenced in Embezzlement Case
headline.print_headline: Ex-President of Argentina Is Convicted of Corruption
